explanation: formal; to become less strong; to make something less strong
sentence: The storm showed no signs of abating.
sentence_gap: The storm showed no signs of _______.

explanation: an idea, thought, or plan that was not originally intended but is thought of at a later time
sentence: The pillars seem to have been added to the entrance as an afterthought.
sentence_gap: The pillars seem to have been added to the entrance as an ____________.

explanation: formal; said or thought by some people to be the stated bad or illegal thing, although you have no proof
sentence: Several alleged drug lords are to be put on trial.
sentence_gap: Several _______ drug lords are to be put on trial.

explanation: to enjoy sitting or lying in the heat or light of something, especially the sun
sentence: We could see seals on the rocks, basking in the sun.
sentence_gap: We could see seals on the rocks, _______ in the sun.

sentence: He sat in his short overcoat leaning against a birch tree.
sentence_gap: He sat in his short overcoat leaning against a _____ tree.

sentence: The underground cavern was formed where water used to flow.
sentence_gap: The underground ______ was formed where water used to flow.

explanation: formal; the way that someone looks, seems, and behaves
sentence: There was nothing in his demeanor that suggested he was anxious.
sentence_gap: There was nothing in his ________ that suggested he was anxious.

explanation: a word or an expression that is used to show affection
formal or old-fashioned; deserving respect and admiration
sentence: I would never doubt the worthy intentions of that estimable gentleman.
sentence_gap: I would never doubt the worthy intentions of that _________ gentleman.

explanation: not wanting or not able to believe something, and usually showing this
sentence: A few incredulous spectators watched on as Paterson, ranked 23rd in the world, beat the champion.
sentence_gap: A few ___________ spectators watched on as Paterson, ranked 23rd in the world, beat the champion.

explanation: a piece of thick material that you put on the floor, often in order to protect it
sentence: Wipe your feet on the mat before you come in, please.
sentence_gap: Wipe your feet on the ___ before you come in, please.

explanation: (of a bird or animal) to lose feathers, skin, or hair as a natural process before a new growth of feathers, skin, or hair
sentence: After three to four months, pups molt to the color of adult females and subadults.
sentence_gap: After three to four months, pups ____ to the color of adult females and subadults.

explanation: a violent or aggressive act toward someone because of something bad that they have done toward you
sentence: They shot ten hostages in reprisal for the assassination of their leader.
sentence_gap: They shot ten hostages in ________ for the assassination of their leader.

explanation: to laugh and talk about a person or idea in a way that shows that you think they are stupid or silly
sentence: The critics scoffed at his paintings.

explanation: the activity of fighting a war, often including the weapons and methods that are used
sentence: The debate soon degenerated into open warfare.
sentence_gap: The debate soon degenerated into open _______.
